apply(MysqlConnect) - Method in class qqa.db.dataset.Filter

ask(String) - Method in class qqa.db.MysqlConnect
Asks a query: does not change database and returns a result set
assessCoverage(DocumentBEs) - Static method in class qqa.QQA
returns the coverage of a be, based on the coverage of its answer
assessCoverage(String, SentenceBEs, Vector<DocumentBEs>) - Static method in class qqa.TEST_QQA
returns the coverage of a be, that is the percentage of answers containing the be among those answering the same question as the one the be is being extracted
assessNovelty(String, SentenceBEs, DocumentBEs, Vector<DocumentBEs>) - Static method in class qqa.QQA
returns the coverage of a be, that is the percentage of answers containing the be among those answering the same question as the one the be is being extracted returns the novelty of the be, that is the percentage of sentences among all sentences in all answers to the questions (except the sentence itself) that do not contain the be.
assessQuality(DocumentBEs, Double, Double) - Static method in class qqa.QQA
returns the quality of a be, based on the quality of its answer and the quality of the best worst answer to the same question
assessRelevance(String, SentenceBEs, DocumentBEs) - Static method in class qqa.QQA
returns the relevance of a be to its question
assessRelevance(String, SentenceBEs, DocumentBEs) - Static method in class qqa.TEST_QQA
returns the relevance of a be to its question
avgBeWeight - Variable in class qqa.be.SentenceBEs
stores the average weight of the Bes in the sentence
